message.name: ENTITY_NOT_FOUND
message.text: A database entry in table {TABLE} was not found. No rows were returned when executing the finder method ''{FINDER}'' with the argument(s) ''{Serializable:ARGUMENTS}'' on entity bean {ENTITY}.
message.solution: Review the log file to determine if the usage of the Administration Tool led to the error. Create the requested value prior to using the Administration Tool or change the query used for retrieving the value via the Adminstration Tool.
